title: Growing Up Wilder: The diary of Virginia Anne Wilder
description: “This is for your thoughts,” she said. So…this is my story.  Meet Virginia Anne Wilder, a spunky young girl you’ll soon grow to love! Set in a rural part of Texas during 1921, Virginia laughs, toils, dreams, and enjoys life alongside her loving family and friends. On her family’s farm, there is always plenty of work to do and entertainment to be had. Virginia’s diary spans over some of the most important times of a young girl’s life as she gets into scraps and learns vital lessons about friendship, sorrow, and love. If tragedy happens or hardships come, will Virginia know what to do? Penned in delightful diary format, explore through Virginia’s eyes as she discovers what’s most important in her life and blossoms into a leading young woman.  A lot can change when you're growing up...  Also included in the back is a historical note complete with photographs and recipes from the book.
